thread.title: TTPM™ Names The Original Whiffer Sniffers™ as One of the Most Wanted Collectible Toys for the 2015 Holiday Season
thread.title_full: TTPM™ Names The Original Whiffer Sniffers™ as One of the Most Wanted Collectible Toys for the 2015 Holiday Season - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: TTPM™ Names The Original Whiffer Sniffers™ as One of the Most Wanted Collectible Toys for the 2015 Holiday Season
text:
Bearington Collection
KENNESAW, Ga. , Oct. 8, Last week, to kick off its annual Holiday Showcase, TTPM™, the leading review site for toys, tots, pets and more, released its Most Wanted Toys List for the 2015 Holiday Season and awarded The Original Whiffer Sniffers™ by Bearington Collection as one of the Most Wanted Toys in its Collectible Toy Category.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151007/275138
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151007/275139
The TTPM Most Wanted List is an independently curated list of top toys and kids lifestyle products for the holiday season. TTPM compiled the Most Wanted List by Product Category, highlighting toys specific to various ages and interests, ranging from categories like radio control to riding toys, pet products and video games, and everything in between.
"We couldn't be more excited about being recognized as one of the most wanted collectible toys for the holiday season," said Jon Bailey , Vice President of Whiffer Sniffers. "We launched the Whiffer Sniffer line back in April and it's been warp speed since then…we've been having to air freight in product just to keep up with demand…we're definitely living up to our most wanted status."
Along with this award, Whiffer Sniffers has been a social 'scentsation' with the top independent YouTube toy review channels. Since the first Whiffer Sniffer toy reviews were posted in April, like those from DisneyCarToys, The Mommy & Gracie Show , and KidToyTesters, Whiffer Sniffer featured videos have accumulated over four million views on YouTube.
Series One of The Original Whiffer Sniffers is available as 12 unique scented plush characters that can be purchased as either a smaller, collectible backpack clip size or a larger huggable plush size. Two limited edition Christmas pieces will hit stores in mid-October are already positioned to be the hard to find stocking stuffer. Whiffer Sniffers will launch Series Two starting in February of 2016.
About Whiffer Sniffers
The Original Whiffer Sniffers is a collectible line of scented plush characters that are available as either backpack clips or larger huggable versions. Twelve unique, fun characters, like 'Kumana Wanna Smell Ya,' the surfing pineapple or 'I.B. Poppin,' the movie loving buttered popcorn, are currently available in Series one with additional holiday characters set to launch mid-October, 2015 and Series Two to launch in February of 2016. For more information, or to find a retailer, visit www.whiffersniffers.com .
About Bearington Collection
Bearington Collection has been manufacturing award-winning collectible plush bears and animals since 1997. Bearington's baby division, Bearington Baby is one of the top three baby plush & accessories lines in the United States . Bearington's newest division, The Original Whiffer Sniffers, is the company's first entry into the toy segment. www.bearingtoncollection.com
About TTPM
TTPM® is a leading product review site for toys, tots, pets and more. With more than 10 million monthly views of its comprehensive video reviews, TTPM is the number one resource for consumers seeking the best in toys, baby gear, pet toys, kids electronics, and sporting goods.
Media Contact:
Jon Bailey
678-202-8546
